channel.title: Help please! got a problem, i get 8 players and servre crashes! :((
channel.description: Everytime i get up to 8 players on my server it crashes and on the bottom of my moparscape client it says - Ilx Val Ilx too many players. Why does it say that and how do i make it hold more people without crashing! HELP PLEASE :)

item.title: Help please! got a problem, i get 8 players and servre crashes! :((

item.description:
@X_Val_X wrote:

invalid name:

no, you just go into server.java and increase the amount of connections.

it says public static int MaxConnections = 100000; …So why can only 8 people connect?
